info.name: about:dark
info.description: Tries to minimize bright background flashes by making the tab default background color match the Firefox Developer/Compact Dark theme.
info.additionalInfo:
<dl>
<dt>1.1 / 2017-06-15</dt>
<dd>Makes the about:about page changed in Firefox 55 more readable.</dd>
<dt>1.0 / 2017-02-02</dt>
<dd>Initial release</dd>
</dl>
